import React from'react';import{X}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TRANSFORMATION_GUIDES=[{name:'Copy (Direct)',desc:'Directly copies the source field value to the target field without any modification.',example:'Source: "John" → Target: "John"'},{name:'Uppercase',desc:'Converts all text to uppercase letters.',example:'Source: "john doe" → Target: "JOHN DOE"'},{name:'Lowercase',desc:'Converts all text to lowercase letters.',example:'Source: "JOHN DOE" → Target: "john doe"'},{name:'Text Replace',desc:'Finds and replaces specific text patterns.
